titleStmt.title: A poem in praise of beauty and musick set by Mr. Will. Crofts ; after the manner of a St. Cæcilia's Song.
titleStmt.author: Croft, William, 1678-1727.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
Bound and filmed with Wing C7007A: The deliverance : a poem to the Prince of Orange / By a person of quality. London : Printed and are to be sold by R. Baldwin, MDCLXXXIX.
